definition: accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: His painting is an exact copy of the original.
sentences.chinese: 他的畫是與原作絲毫不差的臨摹作品。

sentences.english: The facts mentioned in the report tally to every detail.
sentences.chinese: 報告中所提到的事實都絲毫不差。

sentences.english: His conduct was nothing short of madness.
sentences.chinese: 他的行爲與瘋狂絲毫不差。

sentences.english: His painting is a/an exact copy of the original.
sentences.chinese: 他的畫是與原作絲毫不差的臨摹作品。
